name: Neopets Save File
summary: Save file used by Neopets: Puzzle Adventure, a puzzle-solving adventure game; contains game data for individual Neopets that is automatically saved as the player progresses through the game; includes the Neopet's level, stats, and bonus points; also includes customized character information such as species, color, and name; not meant to be manually opened.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
